results.deck: Nival Interactive is a Russian game developer founded in 1996.
results.description: Formerly known as Mir Dialogue, Nival Interactive in one of Russia's most succesful and prolific game development companies. Nival Interactive was founded in 1996. In 2005, Nival Interactive was bought by the Ener1 Group and reorganized. Games released by Nival Interactive include Etherlords, Silent Storm and Sea Legends.
results.name: Nival, Inc.
